statements: DELETE FROM satellite_coverage_areas WHERE coverage_range > 100 AND area_name LIKE 'North%'
DELETE FROM signal_strength WHERE satellite_id = 3 AND signal_strength < -80
DELETE FROM coverage_areas WHERE satellite_id = 1 AND coverage_area = 'North America'
DELETE FROM signal_strength_history WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND signal_strength < 50
DELETE FROM Location WHERE coverage_area_id IN (SELECT coverage_area_id FROM SatelliteCoverageArea WHERE satellite_id = 2);
DELETE FROM AreaCoverage WHERE coverage_area = 'North Pole';
